title: 仪容之三
description: 3 part ‘Jelenlét’ series by Jancso, from 1965 to 1986. Harmadik jelenlét ('The Third Presence') (1986) 13 min.

title: Aaron Rodgers: Enigma
description: Follows NFL quarterback Aaron Rodgers' comeback with the New York Jets and his life off the field, including his advocacy for ayahuasca, a psychedelic brew.

title: 与世界的最后一眼相遇
description: How would you deal with the unexpected diagnosis that three of your four children will be severely visually impaired due to an untreatable genetic condition? Edith Lemay and Sebastian Pelletier dream
